description: Triangle of up-down sums of k-th powers: a(n,k)=sum(i^k,i=1..n)+sum((n-i)^k,i=1..n-1), n,k>0.
mathematica: a[n_, k_] := HarmonicNumber[n, -k]+Zeta[-k]-Zeta[-k, n]; Flatten[ Table[ a[n-k+1, k], {n, 1, 11}, {k, 1, n}]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 29 2011 *)
